description:
Seasonic’s Vertex GX-1000 is on sale now. Because you also deserve a shiny new upgrade: https://lmg.gg/VTXSS

We did it Reddit! With your help Linus, Alex, and Elijah were able to build a computer worth of our new CEO Terren Tong. What parts did we end up picking, and how did it turn out?

Get 20% our Retro Screwdriver by clicking through the "View Products" button on this video (discount only available to customers in the US & Canada).

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1574875-why-did-you-make-me-build-this/

Buy a Seasonic Focus PX-850 PSU: https://geni.us/N1Su
Check out the Sinister Cases Mini ITX Minimalist Case: https://www.sinistercases.com/products/mini-atx
Buy an Intel Core i5-12600K CPU: https://geni.us/nQSHX
Buy an Alphacool Eisblock XPX Pro Aurora CPU Water Block: https://geni.us/pSuyym
Buy an ASUS ProArt Z690-CREATOR WiFi Motherboard: https://geni.us/QySxT
Buy G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 6000MTs CL36 2x16GB DDR5 RAM: https://geni.us/KiXbCZ
Buy a Crucial P5
title: Why did you make me build this?
